impact-statement: An experimentally constrained model shows that Escherichia coli faces fitness trade-offs in chemotaxis behaviors, and that adaptation of phenotypic diversity through altered gene regulation permits populations to resolve these trade-offs.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.

aff1.dept: Department of Molecular, Cellular and Developmental Biology

contribution.con1: NWF, Designed the research, performed simulations, analyzed and interpreted the data, and wrote the paper
contribution.con2: WP, Contributed to the design of the mathematical model and the interpretation of the data
contribution.con3: YSD, Helped design the research, analyze the data and write the paper
contribution.con4: JL, Contributed to data analysis and Pareto front analysis of the results
contribution.con6: TE, Designed the research, analyzed and interpreted the data, and wrote the paper
